attributes.action: Give children the knowledge needed to save a life
attributes.additional_details: At many homes throughout Britain children could be the first person on scene to deal with a situation where a life could be at risk. Therefore, I believe the Government should introduce a training programme into schools so that children can learn the vital skills and procedures needed to save a life. This could see children being taught what to do in an emergency situation, and range to learning first aid procedures such as CPR.
